description: Vladimir Marugov, the owner of Meat Empire, and his partner were in a sauna when they were attacked.
title: Vladimir Marugov murder: Russian 'Sausage King' killed in sauna with a crossbow
title_page: Vladimir Marugov murder: Russian 'Sausage King' killed in sauna with a crossbow - BBC News
maintext: It did not name the man, but local media identified him as Mr Marugov, the owner of the Ozyorsky and Meat Empire sausage factories.
